name: Fizzy Popov Vintage Bird Song Inspired Pocket Mirror
description:
These gorgeous Pocket Mirrors make the perfect small gift, if you can bear to give it away that is! Ideal for keeping in your purse or pocket. The original designs are inspired by vintage images, creating a beautiful nostalgic collage of times gone by! 

Each mirror is packaged with a pretty organza bag. 

Dimension: 5.8cm diameter 

Pocket mirrors are made with real glass mirrors and not suitable for very young children.
